TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListBoxItemWrapperAutomationPeer extends System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkElementAutomationPeer

Docs.summary: Exposes the sub-tree for the data items in a to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks When data items are shown in UI, the system creates a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> sub-tree for the data items. The system also creates an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer> for each data item; when the UI for the data item is created, this ListBoxItemWrapperAutomationPeer is also created. The two peers then merge to form a single peer.
